com.intel.icecp.node.security.trust.impl

Class HierarchicalTrustModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.icecp.node.security.trust.impl.HierarchicalTrustModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TrustModel<PrivateKey,PublicKey>

    public class HierarchicalTrustModel
extends Object
implements TrustModel<PrivateKey,PublicKey>
    Implementation of a basic hierarchical TrustModel that:
    1. Retrieves the signing key from a given IcecpKeyManager
    2. Retrieves the verification key from the local key manager only if its associated certificate is verified against key manager trust base.
